name: GREEN SLAAD
senses: Blindsight 30 ft., Darkvision 60 ft.; Passive Perception 12

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.text: The slaad has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Regeneration
traits.text: The slaad regains 10 Hit Points at the start of each of its turns if it has at least 1 Hit Point.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The slaad makes three Chaos Staff attacks.

actions.name: Chaos Staff
actions.text: Melee or Ranged Attack Roll: +7, reach 10 ft. or range 60 ft. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) Force damage. Until the start of the slaad's next turn, the target has a condition determined by rolling 1d4: on a 1, Charmed; on a 2, Frightened; on a 3, Poisoned; or on a 4, Incapacitated.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.text: The slaad casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 14): At Will: Detect Magic, Detect Thoughts, Mage Hand 1/Day Each: Fireball, Invisibility (self only)

bonus_actions.name: Shape-Shift
bonus_actions.text: The slaad shape-shifts into a Small or Medium Humanoid, or it returns to its true form. Other than its size, its game statistics are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed.
